inputs.sentence: Recently, we are more interested in leveraging AI to solve ethic issues.

outputs.sentence: Recently, we are less uninterested in leveraging AI to solve ethic issues.

inputs.sentence: Jack and Ketty bought an apple from a often reputable person.

outputs.sentence: Jack and Ketty bought an apple from a infrequently disreputable person.

inputs.sentence: It is useful to keep the right answer in mind.

outputs.sentence: It is useless to keep the incorrect answer in mind.

inputs.sentence: Steve is able to recommend movies that depicts the lives of beautiful minds.

outputs.sentence: Steve is unable to recommend movies that depicts the lives of ugly minds.

inputs.sentence: I wonder the reason why you want to select a rarely successful team?

outputs.sentence: I wonder the reason why you want to select a often unsuccessful team?
